title: Historian argument on causes on French. Rev

content.prompt: In the first paragraph, Stromberg most clearly criticizes which of the following historical interpretations of the French Revolution?

choices.label: The French Revolution was primarily motivated by cultural nationalism.
The French Revolution was an example of class conflict.
The French Revolution was an example of Social Darwinist concepts of struggle.
The French Revolution was primarily motivated by short-term fiscal crises.

unit.text: 5: Conflict, Crisis, and Reaction in the Late 18th Century

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Identify and describe a claim and/or argument in a text-based or non-text-based source.
